> On Apple M1:
> gcc-cross-sans-libc-aarch64-linux-gnu-7.5.0

It looks like your trying to build for aarch64 on aarch64. That doesn't currently work, see #22458.

> Don't you mind posting your GUIX hashes for archived output files?

Do you mean for the other HOSTS? They wont be reproducible until I've addedd additional `/gun/store/*` paths for the other cross-compilers. I'll do that, and push up an updated change, along with new hashes for all HOSTS.
Does guix not have a way for us to get the store paths programatically rather than hard coding them?
